pages.name: Pigman
pages.text: Along with the piglins, there are also pigmen, Intelligent humanoid pigs which are also formidable warriors. Pigmen can also trade a variety of items, and can be found wandering, but also in villages
Pigmen primarily dwell in the sky dimension, and they also have established a small nomadic population in the overworld, primarily in caves.

pages.name: Zombie Pigman
pages.text: The zombified version of the pigman, it lives in all the nether biomes. They are created when a pigman enters The End or The Nether, and any dimension without skylight

pages.name: Ender Trader
pages.text: Ender Traders are elusive pigmen, which travel between the Overworld and The End, and sell useful items
